thoughts.text: I love my house.
I can do the dishes tomorrow.
I should play that new game.
The shower is nice and clean.
Need to pick up groceries this week.
We're low on milk.
Dinner was tasty.
The air conditioner works great.
Need to look for a new job.
Hope I get hired, soon.
Tech Co. seems like a good place to work.
What should my starting pay be?
I should call my mom.
Haven't heard from dad in a while.
My spouse seemed really happy today.
I should invite my friends over.
The neighbors are really nice.
Hope I can make some new friends.
Graduation is around the corner.
Finals shouldn't be too bad.
I'll finally have a degree soon.
Physics, Algebra, Science...
Good grades this semester.
